entry.title: Nutri Gourmet - Fiesta Medium Thick Chunky Salsa - 3.78 L
entry.summary:
Vendor: Nutri Gourmet
Type: FOOD
Price: 23.99

Nutri Gourmet - Fiesta Medium Thick Chunky Salsa - 3.78 L

Whether you plan to pile it atop a freshly baked tortilla chip or drizzle it on a mouth-watering burrito, nothing spices up your food quite like medium salsa.

This salsa, made from succulent vine-ripened tomatoes, adds the perfect fresh taste to any dish. A medley of only the best peppers, onions, and garlic intermingle to create the perfect balance of zest. This delicious blend is completed with a selection of premium quality jalapeno peppers, giving an added spicy kick for your customers' taste buds.

entry.title: Muy Fresco - Cheddar Aged Cheese Sauce - 6 x 3 Kg
entry.summary:
Vendor: Muy Fresco
Type: FOOD
Price: 97.99

Muy Fresco - Cheddar Aged Cheese Sauce - 6 x 3 Kg

Kick up the flavor of any popular snack food with this creamy and cheesy Muy Fresco cheese sauce!

Great for restaurants and concession stands, this smooth and creamy Muy Fresco cheese sauce adds a kick of flavor to your crispy, crunchy nacho chips! Serve a generous helping of nacho chips with cheese sauce, ground beef, and all the toppings for a table to share, or offer a nacho tray with a portion cheese sauce for your customers to grab on the go.

Great for Snacks and Recipes

This versatile, yellow/orange-colored cheese sauce is certainly not limited to nachos. Whether it's used as a topping or an ingredient, this cheese sauce is great for adding a little extra heat to macaroni and cheese, chili cheese dogs, and just about any recipe that calls for cheese.

entry.title: VH - Garlic Hoisin Sauce - 355 ml
entry.summary:
Vendor: VH
Type: FOOD
Price: 4.29

VH - Garlic Hoisin Sauce - 355 ml

With its reddish-brown color and thick consistency, this hoisin sauce makes an excellent marinade or glaze for a variety of dishes! Made with soy sauce, miso, garlic, chili peppers, sugar, and spices, this hoisin sauce has a salty-sweet taste.

Use it as a tableside condiment so your customers can add just the right amount of hoisin sauce to their flavorful dishes.

It also makes an excellent ingredient for Chinese-style barbeque ribs! From General Tso's chicken to even chow mein, you'll be able to use this sauce for a variety of Asian specialties. Ready to use right from the bottle, this product will help you create a new world of flavors for your menu!

entry.title: Lee Kum Kee - Panda Oyster Sauce - 510 g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lee Kum Kee
Type: FOOD
Price: 5.99

Lee Kum Kee - Panda Oyster Sauce - 510 g

Add irresistibly rich, savory flavor to your menu with this Lee Kum Kee Panda Brand oyster flavored sauce! Made with real oyster extract and flavored with salt and a hint of sugar, this thick, dark brown sauce is a perfect way to add salty, deeply umami flavor with hints of caramelized sweetness to a whole host of dishes. This ready-to-use sauce is thick yet flows freely, making it the perfect consistency for dipping, drizzling, or including in sauces and marinades. This oyster sauce is a perfect way to ensure that you keep your Asian restaurant well-stocked with the essentials. Plus, it's made without artificial flavors or preservatives, making this sauce a natural choice for your establishment.

Oyster sauce is a popular condiment and seasoning in Cantonese, Thai, and Vietnamese cuisine. Its most common use is as a sauce for stir fried vegetables and meats; this oyster sauce will give your cooking a velvety mouthfeel and create an eye-catching, glossy sheen on your prepared dishes! Simply add a few tablespoons to your stir fry to bring rich flavor to your dishes, or combine with other ingredients to make decadent sauces. Try mixing it with rice wine, chili oil, soy sauce, sesame oil, garlic, ginger, or the Asian seasonings of your choice to create layers of mouthwatering flavor! It also makes a great marinade for a wide variety of meats, and can be mixed with other ingredients to create dipping sauces for your most popular appetizers. No matter how you choose to use it, this Panda Brand oyster flavored sauce is sure to become a staple in your busy kitchen!

entry.title: Kraft - Tartar Sauce - 3.78 L
entry.summary:
Vendor: Kraft
Type: FOOD
Price: 25.99 - 48.99 (2 variants)

Kraft - Tartar Sauce - 3.78 L

A must-have condiment for fried seafood favorites like fried shrimp, fish sticks, and crab cakes, this tangy tartar sauce will deliver just the right amount of bold flavor! Quickly and easily enhance your seafood dishes with the zesty taste of this classic condiment. Bursting with flavor, this tartar sauce is the perfect fusion of sweet pickle relish and creamy mayonnaise peppered with savory onion powder, herbs, and spices. Made from natural ingredients, this tartar sauce will delight your customers with the classic taste they know and love.

The texture of tartar sauce is slightly thicker than other sauces. It has a creamy consistency that tastes cool and tangy over grilled or pan-fried fish and deep fried foods. Save the hassle and kitchen prep time mixing tartar sauce from scratch with this container that is ready to serve! It still has a homemade taste that's sure to please your seafood-loving patrons. Spice up the menu offerings at your restaurant or diner, and offer this rich, creamy, zesty tartar sauce.

  • One 3.78L bottle of Kraft Tartar Sauce
  • Ready-to-serve, just pour straight from the bottle
  • Use on meats, poultry, fish, sandwiches and vegetables

entry.title: Kikkoman - Teriyaki Sauce - 3.78 L
entry.summary:
Vendor: Kikkoman
Type: FOOD
Price: 16.99 - 96.99 (2 variants)

Kikkoman - Teriyaki Sauce - 3.78 L

Sweet, savory, and tangy, this teriyaki sauce offers a versatile and tasty addition to your marinades and Asian dishes!

Featuring the perfect blend of soy sauce, spices, molasses, garlic, and other seasonings, this  teriyaki sauce makes it easy to add bold, authentic flavor to a variety of dishes with minimal effort. Ideal for Asian restaurants, bistros, and steakhouses, this teriyaki sauce brings distinctive, quality flavor to your foods at an amazing value.

Sweet and Savory Flavor

The salty-sweet, tangy flavor of teriyaki sauce makes it ideal for using as a cooking sauce. Use it to flavor grilled seafood, such as salmon, tuna, or yellowtail, as well as beef, and chicken. It can even be used as a dipping sauce for potstickers and dim sum.

Popular in Asian and Western Cuisine

This full bodied teriyaki sauce is great for everything from traditional teriyaki chicken and teriyaki meatballs to teriyaki-seasoned barbecued ribs. Use it in vegetable stir fry, for seasoning tofu, or use it as an ingredient to create signature marinades, glazes, or sauces for meats.

entry.title: Pataks - Tikka Masala Cooking Sauce - 400 ml
entry.summary:
Vendor: Pataks
Type: FOOD
Price: 6.49

Pataks - Tikka Masala Cooking Sauce - 400 ml

A rich, tangy sauce from Rajasthan in northern India. Tikka Masala with chicken is the most popular Indian restaurant dish in the UK. Its full flavour comes from a balanced blend of aromatic spices, including coriander and lemon. The characteristic yellow colour arises from the use of turmeric.

entry.title: Pataks - Butter Chicken Cooking Sauce - 400 ml
entry.summary:
Vendor: Pataks
Type: FOOD
Price: 6.49

Pataks - Butter Chicken Cooking Sauce - 400 ml

A popular Indian restaurant dish, Butter Chicken or Murgh Makhani includes Chicken in a spiced tomato, butter and cream sauce. Tomatoes and butter give this mild sauce a rich, creamy flavour.

  • Original butter chicken cooking sauce
  • Wide mouth for easy pouring
  • Suitable for vegetarians
  • GMO-free
  • Gluten-free
  • 400 ml

entry.summary:
Vendor: PC Wing's
Type: FOOD
Price: 20.99

PC Wings - Hot Chili Sauce Portions - 500 x 9 g

Give your customers one taste of this hot sauce, and they're sure to become hooked on its tangy, spicy taste! Extremely versatile and packed with hot flavor, continues to grow in popularity in bars, restaurants, food trucks, and events. It is made from sun-ripened chilies ground into a smooth paste. Just a small amount will spice up any appetizer, snack, or entree you create!

entry.title: PC Wing's - Plum Sauce Portions - 500 x 11 g
entry.summary:
Vendor: PC Wing's
Type: FOOD
Price: 17.99

PC Wing's - Plum Sauce Portions - 500 x 11 g

Brighten any Asian style dish with the vivid color and tart-sweet flavor of this plum sauce! To save preparation time, this plum sauce is ready to use straight from the bottle as a flavorful dipping sauce. Also known as duck sauce, it is a classic Chinese condiment made from plums, apricots, vinegar, and sugar.

Its thick, jam-like consistency is great for dipping crispy egg rolls and other fried appetizers. This versatile condiment can also be used in sweet marinades and bastes for roasted beef, chicken, and pork. Whichever way you use it, plum sauce will help you create a new world of flavors for your menu!

entry.title: Frank's - Red Hot Sweet Chili Sauce - 1.89 L
entry.summary:
Vendor: Frank's
Type: FOOD
Price: 4.99 - 19.99 (2 variants)

Frank's - Red Hot Sweet Chili Sauce - 1.89 L

With a tantalizing, tangy taste, Sweet chili sauce is an incredible addition to any menu. Sweetened red chili peppers create a zesty, but mild flavor that's perfect for the customer craving for a conservative kick of heat. For texture, the sauce is speckled with pieces of chili pepper, giving it a satisfying, pulpy consistency.

Use this sweet chili sauce to glaze salmon or steak or to spice up fish tacos or pork sliders with ginger slaw. It's an especially mouthwatering addition to buffalo chicken dip, great for game day or Friday-night bar fare. To keep things simple in the kitchen, simply serve the sauce in a small dish with an order of chicken wings or a hearty, meatball appetizer. Amp up your presentation by pairing it with an assortment of other sauces for a bold variety of flavors. However you serve it, this sauce provides the ideal combination of sweet and spicy, an addicting duet that's sure to become a customer favorite.

entry.title: Select - Suicide Hot Sauce - 4 L
entry.summary:
Vendor: Select
Type: FOOD
Price: 26.99

Select - Suicide Hot Sauce - 4 L

Looking to add some heat to your most popular meat dishes? Hot sauce has a fiery kick that's unlike any other!

The striking zing and zest of this hot sauce will tempt your patrons into adding as much heat as they can handle to their chicken, tacos, and more. Made from fully aged red cayenne peppers blended with savory vinegar, salt, and garlic, each container of hot sauce abounds with original flavor. Just one dash can instantly spice up barbecue, steak, and other dishes.

Versatile Sauce

Hot sauce has been the secret ingredient in authentic buffalo wings for decades. Smother your wings in this sauce, or use it to make tangy glazes with some heat. The traditional, timeless taste of this hot sauce is perfect for widely popular menu offerings like sweet chili dip, barbecue pork sandwiches, and tacos. Kick up your menu with a hot buffalo chicken dip that's sure to be a hit.

Delicious Flavor

High in demand, make sure to stock up and have enough hot sauce for all of your dishes with this container! Its convenient handle and resealable cap make it easy to transport, store, and even dispense into smaller bottles for table service so your patrons can add just the right amount to their foods. Hot, spicy, and delivering flavor that will tempt your customers back for more, Hot sauce is a top choice full of authentic flavor!

entry.title: Select - BBQ Sauce - 20 L
entry.summary:
Vendor: Select
Type: FOOD
Price: 94.99

Select - BBQ Barbecue Sauce - 20 L

Bold, rich, and tangy barbecue sauce boasts a deep medley of flavors for crafting zesty, mouthwatering dishes. It has a subtle sweetness and a savory blend of spices to taste, as well as a natural hickory smoke flavor for increased complexity; it's classic barbecue sauce perfected. Pair it with a range of light, refreshing flavors for delicious contrast, from creamy cole slaw to salty potato chips and chewy ciabatta bread.

For a true BBQ dish, use the sauce to smooth pulled meat for a savory sandwich, or coat it on baked beans with green pepper, a thick, juicy steak, or on lightly seasoned chicken wings. It makes for the perfect dipping sauce on wing night, and even elevates the traditional pizza with a tangy twist. Try topping the pizza with pineapple and mozzarella for a Hawaiian-inspired dish. However it's used, the barbecue sauce adds bold, tantalizing taste to the menu, dressing up everything from sandwiches and kebabs to salads, appetizers, and sides.
